description:
Retro logo, timeless comfort. Wearing Fjällräven’s classic logo on its chest, this organic cotton jumper gives a nod to Fjällräven’s past, while keeping you warm in the present.

  • Organic cotton feels great and wears well
  • Ribbing at the collar, cuffs, and hem helps keep the warm air right where you want it
  • Regular fit feels like an old favourite since day 1
name: Fjallraven Logo Badge Sweater - Women's
